org.reprap.geometry
Class LayerRules

java.lang.Object
  org.reprap.geometry.LayerRules

public class LayerRules
extends java.lang.Object

This stores a set of facts about the layer currently being made, and the rules for such things as infill patterns, support patterns etc.

getHatchDirection

public HalfPlane getHatchDirection(org.reprap.Extruder e,
                                   boolean support)
The hatch pattern is: Foundation: X and Y rectangle Model: Alternate even then odd (which can be set to the same angle if wanted).

Returns:

getHatchWidth

public double getHatchWidth(org.reprap.Extruder e)
The gap in the layer zig-zag is: Foundation: The foundation width for all but... ...the penultimate foundation layer, which is half that and.. ...the last foundation layer, which is the model fill width Model: The model fill width

Parameters:
e -
Returns:
